5A39A25C.Line1.9118B: And folk think we are monsters. There are men in this world who would take a dying boy, hack the sores from his body, and sell them like herbs to the alchemists.

6337820B.VoiceDir3.9118B: Calming. Suddenly tired. Wants to be alone.

F42E1BDE.Line3.9118B: But you've sated the swamp with their blood. (sigh) Go now...leave with our gratitude.
